resources.string: Wonep converts international calls to local calls without WiFi or data
If the person youâ€™re calling also has Wonep the call will be entirely free
We have a very small charge for non-Wonep calls to mobiles or landlines
Nigeria Education Verification System\n is a unity platform for Nigeria Education governing\n bodies, Higher Institutions, Government Agencies
Powered by the Federal Ministry of Education,\n The NEVS plaform provides secure exchange, and academic \n verification for higers institutions and third parties
Through our National Student Enrollment Programme,\n NEVS is currently been implemented as part of a National \n Education Policy to uniquely register and identify every Nigerian student.
NEVS is actively working with institutions,\n of higher learning across Nigeria to help students collaborate\n in learning and access quality resources.
